name: fat_proc_convert_dcm_dwis
author: AFNI Team
description: Convert sets of DWIs in DICOM format into 'nicer' volume+grad format, reorient volumetric data, and glue together multiple sessions/directories of data.

inputs.description: Directory of DICOM files of the DWI data with 'AP' phase encoding. Can contain a wildcard expression for several directories.
inputs.name: Input DICOM Directory

inputs.description: Prefix (and path) for output data (e.g., *.nii.gz, *.bvec, *.bval files). Required.
inputs.name: Output Prefix

inputs.description: One or more NIFTI files of DWIs.
inputs.name: NIFTI Files

inputs.description: One or more row-wise, gradient (unit-magnitude) files (e.g., *.bvec).
inputs.name: bvec Files

inputs.description: Optional working directory for intermediate files.
inputs.name: Working Directory

inputs.description: Optional chance to reset orientation of the volume files (default is currently 'RAI').
inputs.name: Orientation

inputs.description: Set the prefix for QC image files separately (default is '').
inputs.name: QC Prefix

inputs.description: Turn off reorigin calculation and reorientation.
inputs.name: Reorient Off

inputs.description: Do not remove the working directory of intermediate files (default is to delete it).
inputs.name: No Clean

inputs.description: Do not save the command line call and location where it was run.
inputs.name: No Cmd Out

inputs.description: Do not generate QC image files.
inputs.name: No QC View

inputs.description: Generate a movie of the newly created dataset (AGIF or MPEG).
inputs.name: Create Movie

output-files.description: A NIFTI file with N volumes.
output-files.name: Output NIFTI

output-files.description: A row-wise (3xN) bvec file of the (unit-magnitude) gradient orientations.
output-files.name: Output rvec

output-files.description: A row-wise (1xN) bval file of the gradient magnitudes.
output-files.name: Output bval

output-files.description: A column-wise (Nx6) AFNI-style matrix file of the (scaled) b-matrix values.
output-files.name: Output matA

output-files.description: A column-wise (Nx6) TORTOISE-style matrix file of the (scaled) b-matrix values.
output-files.name: Output matT

output-files.description: A column-wise (Nx3) bvec file of the (b-magn scaled) gradient orientations.
output-files.name: Output cvec
